case.name: Muc v Commissioner of Taxation [2008] FCA 668 (16 May 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: whether notice served on applicant was a "notice of assessment" where included item "balance of this assessment" showing a credit due to the taxpayer after taking into account a credit for provisional tax
provisional tax so credited not in fact paid
discussion of what constitutes a notice of assessment; additional tax
discretion to remit additional tax in "special circumstances"
whether failure to remit additional tax unreasonable.
whether irrelevant considerations taken into account
whether failure to take into account relevant considerations
whether failure to indicate a departure from previous decisions amounted to procedural unfairness. administrative decisions (judicial review) act 1977 (cth)

cross-elasticity of demand. administrative decisions (judicial review) act 1977 (cth) customs act 1901 (cth) part xva amcor ltd v. comptroller-general of customs and others (1988) 79 alr 221 davies craig pty limited v. comptroller-general of customs (1986) 68 alr 105.
